page.title: 18BMX BICYCLING IN THURSO
page.content: { BMXing}in{Thurso}is growing all the time.There are about 150 boys interested in BMX bicycles.We have one cycle shop in Princes Street which also sells accessories.I buy one thing every week.I usually buy stickers.We are hoping for a BMX track but it seems the council have forgotten all about it. There is another series of BMX called FREESTYLE which has got to do with leaving the ground and doing tricks.I have to keep everything oiled.I have to strip the bike and clean it.This takes about 2 hours and I do this every week.My bike is called an MX MISSILE. It is made of CRO-MOLY which means it is a lot lighter than a painted bike but it is much more rust resistant than the normal bike. By Graeme Reid.
